text: Lombardy 3 () is a constituency of Italy. It is in Lombardy. It was created in 2017. ==Election results== ===Overall=== 25 September 2022 Chamber of Deputies election results – Lombardy 03 Coalition Party Party Proportional First-past- the-post Total seats
